title: Hackathon
content: Burn the midnight oil, it’s a race against the clock! Hack your way through the herculean tasks with speed and precision. Charge your laptops and clear your cache- it’s going to be a long night.
Details will be announced soon! Stay Tuned!

title: Appathon
content:
L is for Lollipop, M is for Marshmallow, N is for Nougat and O is for Oreo!
If this is more than just a sweet tooth’s mantra, then get ready for Abacus’ Appathon. Work day and night and prove your skills. After all, it’s all about app-titude!
Details will be announced soon! Stay Tuned!
